data.meanings: to make even that which was odd, make double, pair, make a thing to be one of the pair, adjoin a thing to its like, provide a thing which was alone with another, protect, mediate, intercede, be an intercessor. shaf'un - pair, double. shafa'at - likeness/similarity, intercede or pray for a person.
data.sentence: The word وَالشَّفْعِ comes from the root ش ف ع and is associated with the meanings: to make even that which was odd, make double, pair, make a thing to be one of the pair, adjoin a thing to its like, provide a thing which was alone with another, protect, mediate, intercede, be an intercessor. shaf'un - pair, double. shafa'at - likeness/similarity, intercede or pray for a person.

data.meanings: to suffer loss, defraud, hate, render odd, harass, do mischief, render any one solitary, be single.
data.sentence: The word وَالْوَتْرِ comes from the root و ت ر and is associated with the meanings: to suffer loss, defraud, hate, render odd, harass, do mischief, render any one solitary, be single.
